plot: A young man's jaw is broken by a blind sided punch thrown by his girlfriend's ex. After healing he sets out for revenge only to find that satisfying his taste for vengeance is worse than having it.
title: Through These Eyes
plot_es: A young man's jaw is broken by a blind sided punch thrown by his girlfriend's ex. After healing he sets out for revenge only to find that satisfying his taste for vengeance is worse than having it.
plot_en: A young man's jaw is broken by a blind sided punch thrown by his girlfriend's ex. After healing he sets out for revenge only to find that satisfying his taste for vengeance is worse than having it.
